tag_list: php, ryan, developer, huff, mycodetree, software, engineer
overview:
Ryan Huff is considered by most, a technologist. Having roots in software development, Ryan began his journey of technology self-learning in the early 90’s.

As the Internet began to take shape in the early 90’s, Ryan began studying Internet technologies; in particular PHP and MySQL.

Now, as the C.E.O of MyCodeTree.com, Ryan works with other Internet communities to encourage and further the mainstream adoption and usage of PHP and related open source technologies.
